overview: Caitlin Little is a high school senior from North Carolina. While at cross country practice in the fall of 2017, Little suffered a head injury, that coupled with Lyme disease has left her with a rare form of amnesia. Today, she struggles to hold on to memories for more than a few minutes. The film takes a look into her day-to-day life as her family searches for answers to help her remember.
title: Caitlin Little: Fifteen Forever
